name: Interview with Some People Who Believe in Vampires
name_original: Interview with Some People Who Believe in Vampires
description:
A Journalist A Vampire A Hunter Some uncomfortable questions

A tongue-in-cheek game about monsters who present themselves otherwise.

Logistics:
  • Players: Three, one of whom facilitates.
  • Time: An hour or so.
  • Content: Vampires, all variety of vampire shit, journalism.
  • Tone: Probably silly, but possibly tense and sad!
  • Prep: Very light.
What's Included?
  • 5 page PDF
